channel.title: R on DL;DS
channel.description: Recent content in R on DL;DS

item.title: Notes from rstudio::conf(2020L)
item.author: danielrlabar@gmail.com (Dan LaBar)
item.description: Day 3 sessions (2020-01-29) Open Source Software for Data Science Data, Visualization, and Designing with AI Deploying End-to-End Data Science with Shiny, Plumber, and Pins We’re hitting R a million times a day so we made a talk about it Azure Pipelines and Github Actions Accelerating Analytics with Apache Arrow Updates on Spark MLFlow, and the broader ML ecosystem What’s new in Tensorflow for R? Deep Learning with R Getting things logged Building a native iPad dashboard using Plumber and RStudio Connect in Pharma FlatironKitchen: How we overhauled a Frakensteinian SQL workflow with the Tidyverse Making better spaghetti (plots): Exploring longitudinal data with the brolgar package Day 4 sessions (2020-01-30) Object of type ‘closure’ is not subsettable RMarkdown Driven Development renv: Project Environment to R Designing Effective Visualizations Shiny New Things: Using R/Shiny to Bridge the Gap in EMR Reporting MLOps for R with Azure Machine Learning Totally Tidy Tuning Techniques Neural Networks for Longitudinal Data Analysis Stochastic Block Models with R: Statistically rigorous clustering with rigorous code Day 4 lightning talks (2020-01-29) Datasets in Reproducible Research with ‘pins’ Rproject templates to automate and standardize your workflow Wavesurfer Lessons about R I learned from my cat Interesting packages

item.title: Schedule for rstudio::conf(2020L) talks
item.author: danielrlabar@gmail.com (Dan LaBar)
item.description: 1 Intro 2 Setup 2.1 Packages 2.2 Page rendering tool 2.3 Check robots.txt 3 Scrape 3.1 Load the page 3.2 Examine the content 3.3 Get the JSON 3.3.1 Session 3.3.2 Speaker 3.3.3 Category 4 Prepare 4.1 Convert dates/times 4.2 Add category name and style 4.3 Split out list columns 4.4 Speaker info for each session 4.
